metadata.title: CVE-2022-2191 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: In Eclipse Jetty versions 10.0.0 thru 10.0.9, and 11.0.0 thru 11.0.9 versions, SslConnection does not release ByteBuffers from configured ByteBufferPool in case of error code paths.

criterions.comment: jetty9 package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
